[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@influxdata/influxdb-client](./influxdb-client.md) &gt; [AnnotatedCSVResponse](./influxdb-client.annotatedcsvresponse.md) &gt; [collectRows](./influxdb-client.annotatedcsvresponse.collectrows.md)

## AnnotatedCSVResponse.collectRows() method

CollectRows collects all the result rows in the returned Promise. This method is suitable to collect simple results. Use with caution, a possibly huge stream of results is copied to memory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
collectRows<T>(rowMapper?: (values: string[], tableMeta: FluxTableMetaData) => T | undefined): Promise<Array<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rowMapper | (values: string\[\], tableMeta: FluxTableMetaData) =&gt; T \| undefined | <i>(Optional)</i> maps the supplied row to an item that is then collected, undefined return values are not collected. If no rowMapper is supplied, <code>row =&gt; tableMeta.toObject(row.values)</code> is used. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Array&lt;T&gt;&gt;

Promise of mapped results
